publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3661 Pauline McNeill: Clyde Yard Secures Navy Contract—That the Parliament welcomes BVT’s yard at Scotstoun securing a share of a £150 million order; notes that the contract, which includes training and long-term maintenance support, will help the yard maintain staff levels and balance workloads across BVT sites; notes that BVT offers the largest private sector apprenticeship scheme in Scotland; further notes that these moves demonstrate the long-term sustainability of the maritime industry in the United Kingdom, and calls on the Scottish Government to ensure that both current and new workers in the industry have the opportunity to continue to learn and to develop their skills as this is a vital element in winning orders. Supported by: Elaine Murray*, Trish Godman*, Bill Butler*, David Whitton*, Jackie Baillie*, James Kelly*, Rhona Brankin*

S3M-3661 Clyde Yard Secures Navy Contract (lodged on 10 March 2009) Cathie Craigie*, Sarah Boyack*, Des McNulty*, John Park*, Patricia Ferguson*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Ken Macintosh*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-3661 Clyde Yard Secures Navy Contract (lodged on 10 March 2009) Jim Tolson*, Mary Mulligan*
